comments.comment: 9:30 i really relate to that, everyone told me not to do shrooms if i wasnt going to make it a big life changing event but honestly i only did it bc i was drinking with my friends and we were all doing it while smoking weed. i had never done it before so i had no goals and was just taking it for fun, but it effected me so deeply anyways bc just like u described it enhanced everything i already was telling myself. My life completely changed afterwards, i quit every one of my addictions and focused on my work and studies. all my my self belief i was trying to force for years became reality. a true blessed feeling that no matter the circumstance i will always be able to hold my own. i am my own innocence and my own protector. I am not limited by how other people are able to help  me bc i can truly rely on myself. its always been true but i never really believed it until i did shrooms. when i started tripping i actually left my group of friends and was on my own for a while to really reflect. ive always known what was right in my head but shrooms spoke the words into my heart and thats when i became able to truly live as i am meant to

But when you have a good trip it‚Äôs an overwhelming positive life changing experience; but when you have a bad trip it can be extremely terrifying. I would recommend to anyone because even after a bad trip as soon you calm down you feel peace.

comments.comment: 5:06 ... ü§® 30 to 40 milligrams isn't a heroic dose. That's a micro dose, and a tiiiny micro dose at that. Literally not enough to have a noticeable effect for anyone. If that's what you're giving patients, you might as well just send em home... 5 dried grams is Terrence McKenna's "heroic" dose. How you got that wrong in such a well done video, titled "heroic dose," is beyond me... Recreational use goes anywhere from 1 gram up as high as you'd like. I've personally eaten an entire ounce over a 24 hour period... A good breakthrough ammount for an average first timer is 1 gram at first, increasing .5 grams every 30 minutes to 2 grams. My first complete breakthrough was at 2 grams. My first total "ego death" and life altering trip was at 4 grams... Give people correct info.

comments.comment: The irony of showing Shibuya Crossing, 0:54 , as an image of "society" while discussing how society is ready to adapt and accept is appalling. Japan strictly prosecutes any amount of possession of even Cannabis. Their bureaucracy and society as a whole is so opposed to change that courts are striking down the marriage rights of same sex couples even this last month. Beneficial natural remedies such as Cannabis and psychodelics will never be legalized or normalized there.
